body: Shortly after saying, ''Excuse me'' to a fellow passenger who jostled him on a crowded subway train, a Brooklyn man was slashed across the face by the passenger yesterday, leaving him with a wound that required 23 stitches, the police said. The attacker quickly fled the train at the busy DeKalb Avenue Station in downtown Brooklyn, the police said.
title: Subway Rider Slashed in Face On Busy Train
